body:
This is an excellent point; it's a question of a lot of interest based on
the community meetup yesterday.

On Wed, Mar 2, 2016 at 10:14 AM Carl Mastrangelo notifications@github.com
wrote:

> In grpc/grpc-java#1505 https://github.com/grpc/grpc-java/pull/1505 I
> changed java to use the json formatted protobuf rather than plain old JSON.
> This cleans up a dependency (and shows off our cool protobuf json
> formatting!)
> 
> grpc core should make a similiar change to stay in sync. I believe the
> files that need to be updated are
> - grpc/examples/cpp/route_guide/route_guide_db.json
> - grpc/examples/csharp/route_guide/RouteGuide/route_guide_db.json
> - grpc/examples/node/route_guide/route_guide_db.json
> - grpc/examples/objective-c/route_guide/route_guide_db.json
> - grpc/examples/python/route_guide/route_guide_db.json
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/5533.
